Package sqlline

Class ConnectionMetadata

java.lang.Object
sqlline.ConnectionMetadata
public final class ConnectionMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
Provides information about database connection and its metadata without exposing internal API. Intended to be used by PromptHandler class and its sub-classes.
